Description of Data Files and Scripts

* REL606.gbk

  E. coli REL606 reference genome with updated gene annotations in GenBank flatfile format.

* GenomeDiff

  Files describing mutations in TEE genomes and ancestors in GenomeDiff format.
  See the breseq documentation for a description of this format:
     https://github.com/barricklab/breseq

* DiceSimilarity/TEE.py 
* DiceSimilarity/annotated_gd

  Python script and GenomeDiff files annotated with gene information for performing the Dice similarity
  score calculations. See the header of TEE.py for a description of how to run this script.
